name: Jugglenaut
description:
_____________________________________________________________________

How to play:

Press A/D - Move Left/Right

Press Space - Juggle

Goal of the game:

Pickup the different weapons to defeat your enemies and get to the Ruby. Remember, every weapon is effective against only one type of enemy and it is only used, if it is in your hand and not in the air.

Created by:
Daniel Gaard Hansen – Game Designer, Programmer
Jordy van Opstal – Game Designer, Programmer
Seánó Domhnaill  – Game Designer, Artist, Level Designer
Regő Porkoláb – Game Designer, Animator
Mathias Boldsen Jensen – Game Designer, Music & Sound Designer
Daniel Strübig – Game Designer, Music & Sound Designer
